column5: Who cares if it was cold out. We wanted to fish. So off we head to Dunnville and Fishmaster's place. In tow were the son and his main squeeze. Now Amy has not fished very often, and tends to be afraid of them. Won't hold them or bait hooks, etc.....  The crappie weren't very co-operative but the sunfish were. Dozens and dozens of large slab sized pannies. The young lady was having a blast, she even started baiting her hook to keep the action going.  The smile says it all.   We wound up with a decent number of dinner volunteers from the wounded and too far gone.
Sounds like an enjoyable day! Thanks for sharing. Jim
your son looks "impressed" great pics though.... and if he doesn't put a better smile on for the camera next time,, you can remind him that he has a nice girl friend that LIKES fishing with you lol
You could wave a "C" note under his nose and get the same facial expression
Right on Bruce Looks like you guys had fun with the pannies...  Got to love that!!! Thanks for sharing Leechman
